attributes.additional_details: Ask David Cameron and other ministers to stop using Twitter to keep the electorate informed? All that happens is that they get ridiculed at regular intervals. Govern responsibly and keep the voting  public informed through traditional national media. Internet social media is not the way to go and in fact MOST people do not Tweet or follow government policy in this way.

rejection.details: This is one you need to send personally to the Prime Minister and each individual minister.
